prompt.content: How did Intel (INTC) GAAP EPS compare to management’s guidance in each quarter of FY 2024? Format each as “Q[X] FY2024: [X.X]% BEAT/MISS”, rounded to 2 decimals. Use quarterly earnings releases.

messages.content: [{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Percent vs guidance = [(Actual GAAP EPS − Guided GAAP EPS) / |Guided GAAP EPS|] × 100"},{"criteria":"If Actual >Guidance classify as BEAT otherwise MISS","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"States that percentages are rounded to 2 decimal places","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Q1 actual GAAP EPS reported as -$0.09"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Q1 guidance GAAP EPS reported as -$0.25"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"64% BEAT (Round answer to 2.d.p)"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Calculate : ((-0.09+0.25)/|-0.25|))*100 = 64.00% (absolute)"},{"criteria":"Q2 actual GAAP EPS reported as -$0.38","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Includes Q2 guidance GAAP EPS reported as -$0.05"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Q2 % change = ((-0.38+0.05)/|-0.05|)) x 100= 660.00% (absolute)"},{"criteria":"660.00% MISS (Round answer to 2.d.p)","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Q3 actual GAAP EPS reported as -$3.88","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Q3 guidance GAAP EPS reported as -$0.24","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Compute for Q3 ((-3.88+0.24)/|-0.24|))x100 = 1516.66667% (absolute)","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"1516.67% MISS (Rounded answer to 2.d.p)"},{"criteria":"Q4 actual GAAP EPS reported as -$0.03","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Q4 guidance GAAP EPS reported as -$0.24"},{"criteria":"Compute for Q4 ((-0.03+0.24)/|-0.24|)) x 100= 87.50% (absolute)","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"87.50% BEAT (Round answer to 2.d.p)"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Classify Q1 as BEAT"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Classify Q2 as MISS"},{"criteria":"Q4 as BEAT","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Classify Q3 as MISS","operator":"correctness"}]
